description.value: Upon reaching 20th level, the shaman becomes one with the spirits of her ancestors. She gains a bonus on Will saving throws equal to her Charisma modifier, blindsense out to a range of 60 feet, and a +4 bonus to her caster level for all divination spells. She can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.lnahlmp5mih2ongh]{Astral Projection} as a spell-like ability once per day without requiring material components.
